title: Cant Activate My Club Tag!
body: So I've mad a club. yes there are more than 5 members in it. i can't seem to find the button to activate the club tag or make it active? It was so easy on the old client.... EVERYTHING WAS!!! Ive read about pressing a padlock? i really don't know PLEASE HELP!!!!!!! Also when i  right click the club it comes up with show this club tag and so i do it. but when i go into game it doesn't show{{item:3151}} {{item:3151}} help me <3{{champion:412}}

replies.body:
I've got your account pulled up, and this club does actually have a tag already. Looks like you must have been able to figure it out!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
